Name: Bierwagen Rush
About the game: Bierwagen Rush is a funny casual game with a vibrant art style and an unexploited theme, inspired by the trend of craft beer festivals that took place in the last years in Rio. Create your own brewery branding, select your beer set (always consider the weather), choose their prices (expensive beers make picky clients), and move on to sell some beers. Always pay attention on the missions, their rewards are essential to advance levels. With the Co-Op Mode, you have the chance to sell twice as many beers! But I'm sure you will disrupt each other... LoL. There's also the Versus Mode, to play against your friends. Features: 3 different Campaigns. 8 different types of beer. Brewery branding customization (up to 7.938 combinations). Full character customization (up to 24.010 combinations). Co-Op and Versus Mode (Local). Dynamic Split Screen or Classic Split Screen Option.
